title: N2O4 NO2 equil - effect of adding Ar to mixture

content.question: Which of the following best predicts how the partial pressures of the reacting species will be affected if a small amount of Ar(g) is added to the equilibrium mixture at constant volume?

choices.label: PNO2 will decrease and PN2O4 will increase.
PNO2 will increase and PN2O4 will decrease.
Both PNO2 and PN2O4 will decrease.

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
